name: Walter Wilson in a Dicey Situation
name_original: Walter Wilson in a Dicey Situation
description:
***Submission to the GMTK 2022 Game Jam***

Walter Wilson is dead. Unfortunately, his soul has been cursed to spend the rest of its life in a die after cheating in a board game tournament. The only way to freedom is to throw itself into the dangerous Randbury Volcano. It didn't expect to be trapped inside! Help Walter’s soul find the right exit as the die reveals that this won’t be an easy task.

~~~~Controls~~~~

Mouse - Move and aim the die.

Spacebar - Hold for build-up, Release to launch die.

C - Toggle Free Camera.

WASD - Move free camera left, right, forward, and backward.

Q & E - Move free camera up and down.

~~~~Dice Abilities~~~~

1. Brick - The die is heavier. It’s harder to throw long distances. 

2. Trampoline - The die is bouncier when it hits the ground. 

3. Multi-Hit (3) - The die can be juggled in the air three times. Press Spacebar while it’s in the air to juggle. 

4. Low Friction - The die is less affected by friction. It can keep more momentum while on the ground. 

5. Low Gravity - The die is less affected by gravity. It will stay in the air longer. 

6. Sling Shot - The die is lighter. It can be thrown further and faster.
